snippet: Sgt. John Russell was found guilty of premeditated murder in the 2009 killing of five fellow service members at a combat stress clinic in Iraq.
abstract: Military judge finds Sgt John Russell guilty of pre-meditated murder in 2009 killings of five fellow service members at combat stress clinic in Iraq; Russell faces life in prison with or without possibility of release.
lead_paragraph: Sgt. John Russell was found guilty of premeditated murder in the 2009 killing of five fellow service members at a combat stress clinic in Iraq.

headline.main: Soldier Found Guilty of Premeditated Murder
headline.print_headline: Soldier Found Guilty of Premeditated Murder
